item.title: The trilemma communication device
item.description: The trilemma communication device The trilemma, a choice where you have to pick 2 out of 3 properties, appears often - and more than an intrinsic characteristic of social or productive systems, it’s a useful communication device. Specifically, it’s a more nuanced trade-off representation than the dichotomy. Dichotomy as a comms device is common: do you want to be ‘good’ or ‘right’. Dichotomies are often either false in contradiction or false in antinomy.

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Guillermo. I work in technology. Usually building teams or technology that explores the space between machine intelligence and product experience. I’ve done this at a very large social media company, at a number of start-ups (including my own!) and larger co’s. l0.ai is where I write about technology: machine learning, data and labeling, management and communication.
